name: Musiverse - Keys to the Musiverse Official

metadata.name: #1 - Life is too short for bad music
metadata.description:
Musiverse builds and embraces the new generation of Web3-Music communities.

Our Keys let You enter parties, concerts, and meet-ups, own music and be part of the music industryâ€™s first DAO!

As for social utility, the Keys function as a lifetime pass to all of our music & Web3-related events, including private NFT parties or community meetups. The Keys also grant VIP entrance at all public concerts, conferences, and festivals, which we co-organize through our broadening partnership network. As for the financial utilities, a part of our forthcoming Musiverse Token ($MSV) will be offered to the NFT Holders, while they will have the privilege to participate in the official pre-sale of $MSV in 2023. Our Musiverse Token is designed to serve the governance of the whole Musiverse DAO & Ecosystem. For their artistic benefits, NFT holders have the privilege of minting the the exclusive song selection of our partner, Housematic Radio.
